name: NOSHOT
description:
Confined within a facility as the only test subject that's human, the only living being they are scared of, is you!
In a hurry? You don't need to wait to go f**k some robots up, you get back into the carnage action with just 1 button!!!!
USE THE SHOTGUN TO BOOST YOURSELF!!!!

Use the settings menu to change whatever you want.
Do be warned though there may be bugs.

Music: HellSNAKE (Check this guy out, he's awesome)
Youtube: Underdog (He also likes anime)
